charges.charge_disposition: 60 months custody of BOP; 3 years SRT; defendant shall pay restitution to Medicare in the total amount of $3,500,000.00, jointly and severally with Marla Owuama Docket No. 4:14CR00040-002 and Florida Holiday Island Docket No. 4:14CR00040-003 Further, the defendant shall be accountable for restitution to Medicaid in the total amount of $451,019.81, jointly and severally with Marla Owuama Docket No.4:14CR00040-002; no fine. Court recommends the Defendant be placed as close to Houston as possible. Court recommends vocational training and job search assistance.

1 day custody (has already been served) ; 1 years SRT with special condition of 6 months home confinement (to begin withing fourteen 14 days of sentencing); defendant shall pay restitution to Medicare in the total amount of $3,500,000.00, jointly and severally with Marla Owuama Docket No. 4:14CR00040-002 and Florida Holiday Island Docket No. 4:14CR00040-003 Further, the defendant shall be accountable for restitution to Medicaid in the total amount of $451,019.81, jointly and severally with Marla Owuama Docket No.4:14CR00040-002; no fine. Court recommends the Defendant be placed as close to Houston as possible.

1 day custody (has already been served) ; 3 years SRT with special conditions of 13 months home confinement plus 30 days custody of the United States Marshal Service from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. for five days a week or every day that the building is open (beginning May 4, 2015); defendant shall pay restitution to Medicare in the total amount of $1,972,485.74, jointly and severally with William Owama and Marla Owama.
